entities.name: slughorn
entities.description: Slughorn is introduced as the one who will come out of retirement. He is impatient and grunts in response to Dumbledore.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is introduced as the one who is talking to Slughorn. He is beaming with excitement.

entities.name: garden path
entities.description: The garden path is mentioned as the place where Slughorn and Dumbledore are walking.

relationships.description: Dumbledore invites Slughorn to come out of retirement.
Slughorn requests a pay rise from Dumbledore.
